data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jałoszyński, Paweł, Ślipiński, Adam (2014): Ruthmuelleria, a new genus of Carinodulini (Coleoptera: Coccinellidae: Microweiseinae) from South Africa. Zootaxa 3784 (3): 275-280, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3784.3.7
